amendment.purpose: An amendment to add at the end of the bill certain bills and resolutions to be considered under suspension of the rules.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sessions amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A001) without objection.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Sessions.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Sessions amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Sessions amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
